00030 #include "RegularStimulus.hpp"
00031 #include <cmath>
00032 #include <cassert>
00033 
00043 RegularStimulus::RegularStimulus(double magnitudeOfStimulus, double duration, double period, double startTime, double stopTime)
00044 {
00045     assert(period > 0);
00046     assert(period >= duration);
00047 
00048     mMagnitudeOfStimulus = magnitudeOfStimulus;
00049     mDuration = duration;
00050     mPeriod = period;
00051     mStartTime = startTime;
00052     mStopTime = stopTime;
00053 
00054     //Swell duration to avoid rounding issues
00055     mDuration += period*DBL_EPSILON;
00056 }
00057 
00061 RegularStimulus::~RegularStimulus()
00062 {
00063     // Do nothing
00064 }
00065 
00072 double RegularStimulus::GetStimulus(double time)
00073 {
00074     double beatTime = fmod(time-mStartTime,mPeriod);
00075 
00076     if (beatTime >=0 && beatTime <= mDuration && time <= mStopTime)
00077     {
00078         return mMagnitudeOfStimulus;
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082         return 0.0;
00083     }
00084 }
